name: LittleRedRidingHood
0:
”Alexa, open little red riding hood”
”Alexa, launch little red riding hood”
”Alexa, play little red riding hood”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: demo little red riding hood
des: Think you know the tale? Think again. Our twist on this classic story allows you to choose what happens…with totally different outcomes. Will you meet the wolf? Will you get the cupcakes to grandma?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
